title: Sr Software Development Engineer in Test w/ ML
summary: Are you passionate about creating ground-breaking technology for next generation of voice assistant technology (Siri) that will usher the next revolution of human-computer interaction...
description: This role as Software Development Engineer in Test will own the qualification of Siri on AIML future technologies and customer facing product features by developing evaluation, automation and test methodologies...
key_qualifications:
* 10 + years as Software Development Engineer.
* 4+ years of Designing and Architecting tools and frameworks...
education_experience: BS or MS or PhD in Computer Science or Electrical Engineering with Strong coding and Machine Learning skills and 10+ years of Industry experience
additional_requirements:
* Experience with conversational AI technologies and frameworks
* Familiarity with Apple's research and products
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role...
